short_summary: Data Center Networking Hardware, Software, and Maintenance and Support for DND
description: Notice of Proposed Procurement, Request for Quotation, Request for Information, Request for Proposal Shared Services Canada seeks to procure Data Center Networking Hardware, Software, and Maintenance and Support for the Department of National Defence (DND) in Gatineau, Quebec.
